message.content:
cs.NI, cs.IT, cs.SY, cs.DC, cs.MM

Reasoning: 
1. cs.NI (Networking and Internet Architecture) - The paper focuses on cloud radio access networks (C-RAN) and proposes a technique to balance processing cost and fronthaul rate. 
2. cs.IT (Information Theory) - The paper discusses the optimization problem of selecting the optimal functional split modes and transmission power to maximize throughput under fronthaul rate constraints. 
3. cs.SY (Systems and Control) - The paper formulates the online problem as a Markov decision process (MDP) and proposes a heuristic policy to deal with the curse of dimensionality. 
4. cs.DC (Distributed, Parallel, and Cluster Computing) - The paper discusses the deployment of remote radio units (RRUs) and proposes a technique to save grid power by harvesting renewable energy. 
5. cs.MM (Multimedia) - The paper discusses the impact of flexible functional split on throughput in C-RAN, which is relevant to multimedia applications.
